After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that only one entity clearly refers to a "Material Property", which is "J sc performance". This term refers to the performance of a material in a specific device configuration, specifically in terms of its current density versus voltage (J-V) characteristics. The other entity, "active layer morphologies", refers to the physical structure or arrangement of the active layer in the device, and is not a material property.
